overview: When It Comes To You is a captivating and scintillating story of a woman torn between two men who both profess great love. Anna is engaged to marry “great guy” Thomas but unbeknownst to Thomas, Anna’s ex, James, with whom she experienced great passion, is back in her life. Will Anna opt for security or passion - or will her future be out of her control? Finely crafted and hypnotically erotic, When It Comes To You is the ideal “date night” movie!
title: When It Comes to You
